    • extractIntegers

      public static int[] extractIntegers(String input)
      Extract the coordinate values from the input.
      For example, the player writes "4,6" the method returns the array [4, 6].
      Parameters:
      input - the string inserted by the player.
      Returns:
      the array containing the coordinate int values.
